pullRequest.body:
This matches the approach for `CategoryStruct`, and allows us to use the notation within `MonoidalCategory`.

It also makes it easier to induce the lawful structure along a faithful functor, as again it means by the time we are providing the proof fields, the notation is already available.

This also eliminates `tensorUnit` vs `tensorUnit'`, adding a custom pretty-printer to provide the unprimed version with appropriate notation.

---

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body: !bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/89e4e6a2-59af-4dfb-9b3d-3f2b5cbd2bb8) for commit d2d30aecd72db7b003a429aff10c0bed09418ca6.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/6bce3eed-84ea-484f-85c5-298414615477/to/89e4e6a2-59af-4dfb-9b3d-3f2b5cbd2bb8) against commit e70f8800f70f89b102ad7469128ace674213e1e5:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                Metric         Change
  ==============================================================================
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Category.ModuleCat.Monoidal.Basic       instructions    17.1%
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Category.ModuleCat.Monoidal.Closed      instructions     8.1%
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Category.ModuleCat.Monoidal.Symmetric   instructions    17.0%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Bicategory.End                   instructions     6.5%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Bicategory.SingleObj             instructions     8.0%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Category                instructions    13.6%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Center                  instructions     7.3%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.CommMon_                instructions    34.4%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Discrete                instructions    15.5%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.End                     instructions    23.4%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Free.Basic              instructions     9.8%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.FunctorCategory         instructions   735.9%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Mod_                    instructions    13.8%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Mon_                    instructions     7.9%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.OfHasFiniteProducts     instructions   -12.3%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Opposite                instructions     8.2%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Transport               instructions     6.1%
- ~Mathlib.RepresentationTheory.Action                     instructions     5.8%
```
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/377a1bf9-e3c3-443d-85e8-a31858268320) for commit 43c5823e1ca42ed04a0c6724dceb0c607aa7cdcb.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/fa6ca690-111f-44a9-9355-cb79cc3983dd/to/377a1bf9-e3c3-443d-85e8-a31858268320) against commit 13444d800e71a22689e60023576255503756cd93:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                   Metric         Change
  =================================================================================
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Category.ModuleCat.Monoidal.Basic          instructions    21.7%
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Category.ModuleCat.Monoidal.Symmetric      instructions    12.0%
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Module.LocalizedModule                     instructions     0.3%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Bicategory.SingleObj                instructions     9.1%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Bimod                      instructions     3.0%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Braided                    instructions     2.4%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Category                   instructions    17.6%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Center                     instructions    10.8%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.CommMon_                   instructions    34.1%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Discrete                   instructions    15.4%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.End                        instructions    19.6%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Free.Basic                 instructions    10.0%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.FunctorCategory            instructions   851.5%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Internal.FunctorCategory   instructions     5.0%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Internal.Limits            instructions     4.1%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Mod_                       instructions    11.8%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Mon_                       instructions     9.0%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Preadditive                instructions     1.0%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Rigid.Basic                instructions     1.3%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Transport                  instructions    16.9%
- ~Mathlib.RepresentationTheory.Rep                           instructions     0.3%
```

I think this PR goes in the right direction. Could you just merge with master so as to see nothing breaks?

bors d+

:v: eric-wieser can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
This was indeed broken by (my PRs to) master, but they were the whole point in this refactor anyway; see my last commit for the motivation for this change.
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/619052d1-65c7-407a-b440-a6156b396744) for commit 6c77836b20138afedd3d47e0225bd23bbc9fdd13.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/a4a5dfe6-788e-440a-934c-867f09d2ec4c/to/619052d1-65c7-407a-b440-a6156b396744) against commit bf077b111ca30b6793deafddf07fd8949cb92a3a:
```diff
  Benchmark                                            Metric         Change
  ==========================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Category.ModuleCat.Monoidal.Basic   instructions    -6.2%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.CommMon_            instructions    31.5%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Discrete            instructions    13.4%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.End                 instructions    15.5%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.FunctorCategory     instructions   822.7%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Mod_                instructions    11.1%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Mon_                instructions    11.7%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Subcategory         instructions   -22.6%
+ ~Mathlib.RepresentationTheory.Action                 instructions   -12.3%
```
@joelriou: happy to merge despite the performance hit in `Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.FunctorCategory`?
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/a68fbe7b-2343-489b-bebb-8445d372f858) for commit c6c27bd7946f088dfcaade6b9a6f1b191e8060af.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/a4a5dfe6-788e-440a-934c-867f09d2ec4c/to/a68fbe7b-2343-489b-bebb-8445d372f858) against commit bf077b111ca30b6793deafddf07fd8949cb92a3a:
```diff

  ================================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Category.ModuleCat.Monoidal.Basic         instructions    -6.2%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.CommMon_                  instructions    31.5%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Discrete                  instructions    13.4%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.End                       instructions    15.5%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Mod_                      instructions    11.1%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Mon_                      instructions    11.7%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Subcategory               instructions   -22.5%
+ ~Mathlib.RepresentationTheory.Action                       instructions   -10.7%
- ~Mathlib.RepresentationTheory.GroupCohomology.Resolution   instructions     8.5%
```

That latest benchmark looks much more reasonable
